short_summary: Procurement notice for professional services to maintain, support, and enhance the Evidence Management System (E-trial toolkit) used by Courts Administration Service (CAS).
description: The purpose of this procurement is to secure professional services on an as and when required basis to help maintain, support, and enhance the Evidence Management System E-trial toolkit..., used by the Courts Administration Service.
full_summary:
### Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for E-Trial Tool Kit Technical Support

#### Reference Number
PW-22-01005626

#### Solicitation Number
5X001-22-0490

#### Tender Closing Date
2022-09-13T14:00:00 (Expired)

**Objective**
The procurement objective is to obtain professional services on a call-as-needed basis to provide technical support and maintenance of the Evidence Management System (E-trial toolkit) used by the Courts Administration Service (CAS).

**Scope of Work**

* Provide support and maintenance for the Evidence Management System (E-trial toolkit)
* Modify the configuration of the existing modules and functionality within the Evidence Management System (E-trial toolkit)
* Assist CAS in planning and communication for the full deployment of the Evidence Management System (E-trial toolkit) in all e-court rooms

**Key Details**

* Contracting Entity: Courts Administration Service
* Contract Category: SRV (Services)
* Trade Agreements: ALECC (Accord de libre-échange Canada-Chili), ALEC (Accord de libre-échange canadien), etc.
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Documents**

* The Request for Proposal (RFP) document can be accessed at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/29/fbd00a8e2cb2e542e18ba30ad84861e5/5x001-22-0490_-_acan_-_english.doc](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/29/fbd00a8e2cb2e542e18ba30ad84861e5/5x001-22-0490_-_acan_-_english.doc)
* The RFP document can be accessed at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/29/a36a819f10bc86348c8f65c9750fe795/5x001-22-0490_-_acan_-_english.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/29/a36a819f10bc86348c8f65c9750fe795/5x001-22-0490_-_acan_-_english.pdf)
